{
    "target_object": "a modern sport car",
    "generation_metadata": "Detailed description of the object and the 16 views for 3D reconstruction, including specific angle descriptions, lighting specifications, material properties, and geometric constraints. MUST address the specific issues from previous feedback: Scoring penalties applied: Improvement suggestions found: -1 point each for scores >7; Quality issues: -2 points image quality. - Ensure a perfect 4x4 grid layout without any central or overlapping images. - Remove all shadows and reflections to maintain a pure white background. - Include all required angles, such as top and bottom, and ensure each angle is distinct. - Center the car in each sub-image and maintain consistent lighting across all views. CRITICAL: Object details must remain identical across all views. Learning from 7 previous iterations.",
    "image_prompt": "Generate a PERFECT 4x4 grid layout containing exactly sixteen individual digital photographs, arranged in 4 rows and 4 columns, featuring the EXACT SAME modern sport car captured from 16 DISTINCTLY DIFFERENT 3D angles. Each of the 16 sub-images must be clearly separated and show the IDENTICAL modern sport car from a UNIQUE 3D viewpoint covering the full 360-degree sphere around the object. The 16 angles must include: front, back, left, right, top, bottom, and 10 additional oblique angles distributed evenly around the 3D space (front-left, front-right, back-left, back-right, top-front, top-back, top-left, top-right, bottom-front, bottom-back, etc.). Each grid position must show a COMPLETELY DIFFERENT 3D angle - no two grids should have similar viewpoints. The object's appearance, details, and characteristics remain COMPLETELY IDENTICAL across all 16 views - only the 3D viewing angle changes. The modern sport car is centered in each view, with consistent lighting, scale, and positioning. CRITICAL: ONLY the modern sport car should be visible - NO other objects, items, accessories, or environmental elements. The background must be COMPLETELY PURE WHITE with NO shadows, textures, patterns, or any other elements. The modern sport car should appear to float in pure white space, suitable for 3D reconstruction. CRITICAL: This MUST be a perfect 4x4 grid with exactly 16 individual sub-images, not a single large image.",
    "description": "This image contains a 4x4 grid of 16 views of the same modern sport car, captured from distinct angles to facilitate 3D reconstruction.
